originalText.text: The best experience I ever had purchasing a watch. These two ladies were amazing very nice very respectable. I would definitely recommend my friends to this place. I’m not giving it five stars. I’m giving it 10 stars.

text.text: The best experience I ever had purchasing a watch. These two ladies were amazing very nice very respectable. I would definitely recommend my friends to this place. I’m not giving it five stars. I’m giving it 10 stars.

originalText.text:
Bought myself my first luxury piece from this store the other day while visiting NYC for work. I came in looking for a specific Flagship model, and Viveca pulls the last one out from below the display counter. She pulled out a few more based on my preferences and answered all the questions I had about this purchase as well as the future Longines purchases my fiance and I hope to make. Safe to say, they made us both brand loyalists. Already can't wait to add the next one to our collection!

Edit: I should also mention that when I put my watch on for the first time the next day, the aligator leather immediately started to come undone in the loop that hold the strap together, which I'm sure was just a part of this particular piece of leather rather than a bad product. Anyhow, it was a really small defect, but one I knew would worsen very quickly. Despite it being so small visually, the store ordered me a new replacement strap free of charge. Thanks for the great service guys!

originalText.text: Went in to get my watch resized and the lady behind the desk snatched the watch out of my hand as I was explaining the size I preferred. She then took it to the back and made changes without even discussing them with me and handed me back the watch badly sized and with the screws still sticking out. I went back the next day to ask them to fix this and once again this lady literally took the watch from me as I was in the middle of a sentence and fixed one screw and this time she also managed to scratch the watch. The other salespeople at the store seemed more friendly but this woman ruined the whole experience of buying a beautiful luxury watch. It was extremely unpleasant and after all that I will have to still take my watch to a jeweler to get it looked at. I love my watch but I do not recommend this store.

originalText.text:
Wonderful experience and service at this Longines store. Thank you Mr. Steven for taking great care if us and making sure we find just the right time piece.
The store is very welcoming and we loved the no pressure laid back attitude in finding the right watch. They jave a very nice selection and were also very responsive to email inquiries.

originalText.text: I came in to buy a watch that I’ve had my eye on for a while. Viveca was super helpful in answering all my questions, and she made the whole process a genuine pleasure. So happy with my new watch!
